content: Take a new path off to the right from the fallen stone slab, and you'll find a large wall with two paths in either direction. Head to the right first to find a Monk Supporter standing over a green Wisp you can absorb, and then take the other path.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Precept Corridor'.
The content is as follows:
Take a new path off to the right from the fallen stone slab, and you'll find a large wall with two paths in either direction. Head to the right first to find a Monk Supporter standing over a green Wisp you can absorb, and then take the other path.
